name: Candy Matching Blast
description:
Welcome to the world of Sweet Candy Match puzzle.
Easy to play, just tap 2 or more same colored blocks.
Blast blocks & Create boosters to challenge the brainteaser.
The combination of boosters creates powerful combos that makes easier to achieve the goal.
Chocolate, Orange Juice, Jelly Bear.. Etc. Enjoy the sweet puzzle with various gimmicks and tricks!

Features :
• Completely FREE to play with sweet themed levels.
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.
• Enjoy the games whenever you want, No login & No WIFI.
• Play sweet blast puzzles with explosive boosters.
